body.p: Resided in Frankfort, Kentucky. Served as a captain in the War of 1812 in the 10th Kentucky Light Infantry Volunteer regiment under Col. Boswell. Married Maria Garrard, daughter of Kentucky Governor Garrard, on November 15, 1815. Appointed Adjutant General of the Kentucky State Militia on December 10, 1829, and served in that position until 1851.
